${ModID}:Fertilizer.NAME: Fertilizer
${ModID}:Fertilizer.DESCRIPTION: 抽一张牌。 NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:Fertilizer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 抽 !M! 张牌。 NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:HarvestBeans.NAME: Harvest Beans
${ModID}:HarvestBeans.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies if the last card played 本场战斗 wasn't an Attack.

${ModID}:HarvestCarrots.NAME: Harvest Carrots
${ModID}:HarvestCarrots.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Repeat for each card type you've played 本回合.

${ModID}:HarvestPotatoes.NAME: Harvest Potatoes
${ModID}:HarvestPotatoes.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL If the last card you played 本场战斗 wasn't a Skill, 获得 !B! Block a获得.

${ModID}:HarvestRadishes.NAME: Harvest Radishes
${ModID}:HarvestRadishes.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Apply 1 Weak for each card type you've played 本回合.

${ModID}:OutToMarket.NAME: Out To Market
${ModID}:OutToMarket.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies the first time you play each card type each turn.

${ModID}:PestControl.NAME: Pest Control
${ModID}:PestControl.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Repeat for each card type you've played 本回合.

${ModID}:SoilResiliency.NAME: Soil Resiliency
${ModID}:SoilResiliency.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! 点 力量 and !${ModID}:m2! Dexterity. NL If you've played less than 3 types of card 本回合, 消耗 。

${ModID}:SupplyChain.NAME: Supply Chain
${ModID}:SupplyChain.DESCRIPTION: 获得 a *Fertilizer at the start of each turn.
${ModID}:SupplyChain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 固有 。 NL 获得 a *Fertilizer at the start of each turn.

${ModID}:SowTheSeeds.NAME: Sow The Seeds
${ModID}:SowTheSeeds.DESCRIPTION: 获得 a *Fertilizer. NL Fetch !M! random cards with different types from your 抽牌堆。

${ModID}:TillTheEarth.NAME: Till The Earth
${ModID}:TillTheEarth.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 获得 a *Fertilizer.
